I was on the trail of the Crimson Hood Gang
translation.fr: J'étais sur la piste des Crimson Hoods

translation.en: on account of a bank robbery in Kansas City.
translation.fr: suite à un cambriolage de banque à Kansas City.

translation.en: Turned out somebody got to 'em before me.
translation.fr: Il s'avère que quelqu'un les a eus avant moi.

translation.en: You know I don't rob banks, Marshal.
But you rob them that do, which is all the same to me.
translation.fr: Mais tu dévalises les voleurs, ça revient au même.

translation.en: -Texas. -What?
I was in Texas at the time of that robbery.
translation.fr: J'étais au Texas au moment du vol.

translation.en: How you know when it took place?
Whenever any bank robbery took place, I was in Texas.
translation.fr: Quand il y a un cambriolage, je suis toujours au Texas.

translation.en: Unless, of course, the robbery took place in Texas.
translation.fr: Sauf, bien sûr, s'il a lieu au Texas.

translation.en: Way I hear it, some of them boys with the Crimson Hoods
translation.fr: À ce que j'entends, certains membres des Crimson Hoods

translation.en: are part of a new Rufus Buck Gang, Nat.
translation.fr: ont rejoint le nouveau gang de Rufus Buck, Nat.

translation.en: Rufus in Yuma.
He out. But you knew that already, didn't you?
translation.fr: Il est sorti. Mais tu le savais, non ?

translation.en: Why you sitting here monologuing, drinking up my whiskey,
translation.fr: Pourquoi vous monologuez en buvant mon verre

translation.en: when you should be out rounding up your little deputies?
translation.fr: au lieu de rassembler vos adjoints ?

translation.en: 'Cause he been pardoned, Nat.
Rufus Buck been absolved of his countless depredations.
translation.fr: Rufus Buck est acquitté de ses nombreuses exactions.

translation.en: Seeing as I've been scouring the terrain looking for bank robbers and such,
translation.fr: Mais comme je parcourais le pays à la recherche de cambrioleurs de banque,

translation.en: that particular piece of news failed to reach me.
translation.fr: cette nouvelle a mis du temps à me parvenir.

translation.en: What they sayin'?
Something about guns, killin'.
Why you let that kid take my gun? What kinda stupid rule is that?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu laisses le gamin nous désarmer ? C'est pas malin.

translation.en: -Should be four guns pointing at-- -Shut up, Pickett.
translation.fr: - On serait quatre à braquer… - Ferme-la.

translation.en: You shoot, he dead.
You miss,
all y'all die.
You, come here.
Take these cuffs. Cuff this man.
Or I put three in his chest right now, lessen the trouble.
translation.fr: Ou je lui colle trois balles dans le cœur, ça ira plus vite.

translation.en: Go on.
Tell this young buck to back up.
translation.fr: Dis au jeune loup de reculer.

translation.en: Easy, Jim.
Everybody in here know who I am.
translation.fr: Vous savez tous qui je suis.

translation.en: I'm taking Nat Love to Fort Smith to be tried.
translation.fr: J'emmène Nat Love à Fort Smith pour qu'il soit jugé.

translation.en: Anybody try to follow me,
translation.fr: Si vous essayez de me suivre,

translation.en: y'all know what I do.
translation.fr: vous savez ce que je ferai.

translation.en: Come on.
Y'all enjoy the rest of the evening.
[man] Rufus.
Cherokee Bill, Ms. Smith, top of the morning to you both.
translation.fr: Cherokee Bill, Mlle Smith, bien le bonjour à vous deux.

translation.en: Mr. Buck, glad to have you back in Redwood, sir.
translation.fr: M. Buck, content de vous revoir à Redwood.

translation.en: Any word on the take from the Kansas City bank?
translation.fr: Le butin de la banque de Kansas City ?

translation.en: The Crimson Hoods took it for $25,000. But they were ambushed before they got here.
translation.fr: Les Crimson Hoods ont dérobé 25 000 $, mais ils sont tombés dans une embuscade.

translation.en: Everybody knows it's suicide to take from us.
translation.fr: Tout le monde sait que c'est suicidaire de nous voler.

translation.en: Someone obviously disagrees.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un n'est pas de cet avis.

translation.en: Goddamn it. That just put us right back where we started.
translation.fr: Merde, ça nous ramène au point de départ.

translation.en: How we supposed to build a Mecca without any bricks?
translation.fr: Comment on va construire une Mecque sans briques ?

translation.en: [Trudy] We gonna have to take it out of our own bank.
translation.fr: On va se servir dans notre banque.

translation.en: [man] We don't have that type of money, Trudy.
translation.fr: Nous n'avons pas une telle somme, Trudy.

translation.en: We only got a few pennies over $2,500.
translation.fr: Nous avons à peine plus de 2 500 $.

translation.en: What did he say?
-[man] 2,500-- -I heard you.
-[Trudy] Wiley. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah.
[Rufus] Sure is hot, ain't it?
What's up, little man?
-You wanna see something? -[boy] Yeah.
Watch this now. Don't take your eyes off it.
translation.fr: Regarde bien, ne la quitte pas des yeux.

translation.en: Oh, it's still there! [laughs]
Look at you.
Relic of yesteryear with nothin'.
translation.fr: Une relique du temps jadis, complètement fauchée.

translation.en: And you think you can roll into my town and take what belong to me?
translation.fr: Tu crois pouvoir débarquer ici et me prendre ma ville ?

translation.en: Who the fuck you think I am, huh?
translation.fr: Tu me prends pour qui, putain ?

translation.en: Ain't nobody scared of you and ain't nobody runnin'.
translation.fr: J'ai pas peur de toi, je m'enfuirai pas.

translation.en: I'm a sinister motherfucker too.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je suis un enfoiré.

translation.en: One click of my finger and you disappear.
translation.fr: Je claque des doigts, et tu disparais.

translation.en: So I suggest you leave…
translation.fr: Alors je te conseille de partir

translation.en: before I finish my steak.
translation.fr: avant que je finisse mon steak.

translation.en: -And if you even think about sticking-- -[knocking on door]
translation.fr: Et si tu envisages de rester…

translation.en: Come in.
What is it, Carson?
Sheriff, Mr. Buck wants to see you out front.
translation.fr: Shérif, M. Buck veut vous voir dehors.

translation.en: Tell that man I ain't got nothing to say to him.
translation.fr: Dis-lui que j'ai rien à lui dire.

translation.en: It wasn't a request.
[Rufus] You wanna sell this town while I rot in prison?
translation.fr: Tu vends la ville pendant que je moisis en taule ?

translation.en: The world you knew is gone.
There's a flood comin'.
Do you think you can hold onto this place when it hit?
translation.fr: Tu crois pouvoir garder la main sur cette ville ?

translation.en: At least I know enough to get mine and get out.
translation.fr: J'ai assez de bon sens pour encaisser et partir.

translation.en: Kill me…
and you'll have nothing.
You know, a man like you will have us all subservient
translation.fr: Un homme comme toi nous asservirait tous

translation.en: till the end of our days
translation.fr: jusqu'à la fin de nos jours

translation.en: so's long as you can buy yourself a house,
translation.fr: tant qu'il peut se payer une baraque,

translation.en: a badge, and them goddamn gold teeth.
translation.fr: un insigne et des saloperies de dents en or.

translation.en: You want to do this here?
[Wiley] There you go. That's what you want, right?
translation.fr: Voilà. C'est ce que tu veux ?

translation.en: That's what you came here for?
I won't disappoint you. Come on.
That's what you want. Want some more?
translation.fr: C'est ce que tu veux ? Tu en redemandes ?

translation.en: You want some more, right? You want some more?
[Rufus] Come here, motherfucker.
Here you go.
Oh shit. I done hit gold.
translation.fr: Merde alors, j'ai trouvé un filon.

translation.en: Hey, boy. Come here. Come, get that gold. Get that gold.
translation.fr: Petit, viens là. Prends l'or, vas-y.

translation.en: All right. Tell your mama you rich now! Go ahead!
translation.fr: Va dire à ta mère que vous êtes riches !

translation.en: [Rufus] Now, I ain't gonna kill you, Wiley.
translation.fr: Maintenant, je vais pas te tuer, Wiley.

translation.en: [echoing] You and I were friends once.
But know this.
Redwood will never be yours, never.
translation.fr: Redwood sera jamais à toi, jamais.

translation.en: Never.
Matter of fact, you ain't welcome here no more.
translation.fr: D'ailleurs, t'es plus le bienvenu ici.

translation.en: Now…
I want you to vacate immediately or die where you lay.
translation.fr: je veux que tu dégages de suite, ou tu mourras sur place.

translation.en: Say what?
That's right.
You coulda taken these off a while back. Yep.
translation.fr: - Vous auriez pu me les enlever plus tôt. - Ouaip.

translation.en: Tell me something. How you know Rufus will be in Redwood?
translation.fr: Dis-moi, comment tu sais que Rufus sera à Redwood ?

translation.en: [Nat] He's taking that money from them Crimson Hoods. That's where he'll be.
translation.fr: Il attend le fric des Crimson Hoods. Il sera là-bas.

translation.en: Now you teaming up with a marshal to bring him in.
translation.fr: Et tu fais équipe avec un marshal pour l'arrêter.

translation.en: I ain't bringing him in. I'm bringing him down.
And we ain't teaming up, old man.
translation.fr: Et on fait pas équipe, le vieux.

translation.en: Your life's expendable, Marshal. My gang's ain't.
translation.fr: Vous êtes remplaçable, marshal. Pas mon gang.

translation.en: Shit, since we're out here, I oughta tell you…
I was fixin' to kill you…
when you and your fellas brought in Rufus.
translation.fr: quand vos hommes et vous avez eu Rufus.

translation.en: A lot of men be fixin', son.
translation.fr: T'es pas le seul, mon gars.

translation.en: They always seem to die before they get the job done.
translation.fr: Ils meurent tous avant d'y arriver.

translation.en: Just for the record…
I took Rufus in alone.
translation.fr: je l'ai eu tout seul, Rufus.

translation.en: [Nat] Mary.
I figured you'd be halfway to Fort Smith by now.
translation.fr: Je t'aurais crue en route pour Fort Smith.

translation.en: You can put that gun down, Marshal. This ain't a ambush.
translation.fr: Baissez votre arme, marshal. C'est pas une embuscade.

translation.en: You, on the other hand, might wanna keep yours handy.
translation.fr: Mais toi, tu ferais mieux de garder la tienne.

translation.en: Do you think I'm stupid enough
to fall for that bullshit y'all pulled in my saloon?
translation.fr: pour gober votre petit numéro au saloon ?

translation.en: I don't want you mixed up in this no more.
translation.fr: Je veux plus te mêler à tout ça.

translation.en: Then you shoulda told me so.
I must confess to some raw feelings myself.
translation.fr: Je dois l'avouer, je suis piqué au vif aussi.

translation.en: This ain't no road to ask a friend to travel.
translation.fr: On ne demande pas ça à un ami.

translation.en: Now you take that money we took off them Crimson Hoods
and you buy that ranch you always blabbing about. Hmm?
translation.fr: et achète le ranch dont tu nous bassines.

translation.en: That's mighty generous of you, but that ain't how this gang work.
translation.fr: C'est généreux, mais ce gang fonctionne pas comme ça.

translation.en: Take stays in the usual place, ready to be shared three ways when we come back.
translation.fr: Le butin reste où il est jusqu'à ce qu'on partage en trois.

translation.en: Ain't no coming back from this.
Now get out of here.
All of you. This ain't your fight.
You take on the Devil himself, you gonna need more than you and the marshal.
translation.fr: Contre le diable, le marshal et toi ne suffirez pas.

translation.en: I seen the Devil, and Rufus Buck ain't him.
translation.fr: J'ai vu le diable, c'est pas Rufus Buck.

translation.en: Devil's white.
You got a reason you wanna die, Jim?
translation.fr: Tu as une raison de mourir, Jim ?

translation.en: Outside of you saving me from this?
translation.fr: À part que tu m'as sauvé de ça ?

translation.en: Besides, Monroe said Cherokee Bill run with Rufus.
translation.fr: En plus, Monroe a dit que Cherokee Bill était avec Rufus.

translation.en: Every time I speak on my speed,
translation.fr: Si je parle de ma vitesse,

translation.en: a motherfucker wanna pull Cherokee Bill out they ass.
translation.fr: on me renvoie toujours Cherokee Bill à la tronche.

translation.en: I'ma put a end to that argument once and for all.
translation.fr: Il est temps de régler la question.

translation.en: Like they say in the Book of Clarence, "No man out-speed me."
translation.fr: Comme dit l'Évangile selon Clarence, "Nul homme me sur-tirera."

translation.en: Out-speed ain't a word, and Clarence ain't no book. I'm hopin' Cherokee put a bullet in your ass just to shut you up.
translation.fr: Ce mot et cet évangile n'existent pas. J'espère qu'il t'aura, ça te fera taire.

translation.en: -Hey. -You left these on my wall, Mr. Love. Figured we going after villains, you'll need 'em.
translation.fr: Vous avez laissé ça sur mon mur. Vous allez en avoir besoin.

translation.en: Obliged.
What y'all waiting around for?
You think destiny is comin' to you?
translation.fr: Tu crois que le destin va venir ici ?

translation.en: Hyup! Go!
-Yeah. I know. -[horse whinnies]
Go ahead.
♪ Wahala they go Wahala they come ♪
[Rufus] How do I look?
[Trudy] All right.
Everybody out there?
Just about.
How could you do it?
Leave all of this to Wiley?
If you were runnin' Redwood,
who woulda kept the operation goin'?
Who else woulda kept all them gangs in line?
translation.fr: Qui d'autre pouvait mater tous ces gangs ?

translation.en: Look, I know that Wiley got his ways, but he was loyal once.
translation.fr: Je sais que Wiley a abusé de son pouvoir, mais il était loyal, autrefois.

translation.en: Loyalty is a virtue, Rufus.
translation.fr: La loyauté est une vertu, Rufus…

translation.en: Till it ain't.
You loyal to me?
See these folk here?
Either they can't see it or they don't want to.
translation.fr: Ils voient rien ou ils veulent pas voir.

translation.en: But I believe in what you're doing.
translation.fr: Moi, je crois en ce que tu fais.

translation.en: This place can be the promised land for us.
translation.fr: Cet endroit peut être notre terre promise.

translation.en: And as long as that so, ain't nothing I won't do to see it through.
translation.fr: Et je suis prête à tout pour que ça le devienne.

translation.en: You tell them.
[Trudy] Citizens of Redwood.
A new day is dawning.
As by now you have doubtless learned,
translation.fr: Comme vous le savez sans doute,

translation.en: the territory will officially open up for settlement.
translation.fr: ce territoire sera bientôt officiellement ouvert à la colonisation.

translation.en: Now they say everything we own is gonna stay our own.
translation.fr: On nous dit que ce qui nous appartient restera à nous.

translation.en: But you know as well as I do how much that's worth.
translation.fr: Mais vous savez comme moi que c'est du vent.

translation.en: See, your land, your businesses, your homes
translation.fr: Vos terres, vos commerces, vos maisons

translation.en: has all been promised to the highest bidders
translation.fr: ont tous été promis au plus offrant

translation.en: by your one-time sheriff, Wiley Escoe.
translation.fr: par votre ancien shérif, Wiley Escoe.

translation.en: Now, Mr. Buck can prevent this from happening.
But in order for us to do that, it's necessary that we levy a tax.
translation.fr: Mais pour cela, on doit prélever un impôt.

translation.en: -[crowd muttering] -At what cost to us?
You could scrape every penny from every living soul in this town,
translation.fr: Même en grappillant jusqu'au dernier sou de chaque habitant de la ville,

translation.en: and it wouldn't come near to that.
translation.fr: vous ne réunirez pas cette somme.

translation.en: You got us between a rock and a hard place.
translation.fr: Vous nous mettez dans le pétrin.

translation.en: How long you been alive in this country?
A rock and a hard place is what we call Monday.
I've heard of Rufus Buck.
translation.fr: J'ai entendu parler de M. Buck.

translation.en: How bad a man he is.
But he got himself thrown in jail once before,
translation.fr: Il s'est déjà retrouvé en prison,

translation.en: and I reckon he'll be back there again soon enough.
translation.fr: je suis sûr qu'il y retournera d'ici peu.

translation.en: When he is, maybe I'll come back to this town.
translation.fr: À ce moment-là, je reviendrai peut-être en ville.

translation.en: 'Cause I ain't paying shit.
You think I made Redwood for myself?
To what end?
Redwood ain't a hiding place, 'cause I don't hide.
translation.fr: C'est pas une cachette. Je me cache pas.

translation.en: It ain't a dream. I don't dream.
translation.fr: C'est pas un rêve. Je rêve pas.

translation.en: You know what it is?
It's an example.
It's an example…
for others to follow.
And you…
you are an enemy of progress.
translation.fr: tu es un ennemi du progrès.

translation.en: Please. Please.
-I got a family. -What's your name?
[Rufus] Rest in peace, James.
Now, how much?
How much can be gathered?
Ten thousand.
Maybe 15, if every last cent can be squeezed.
translation.fr: Peut-être quinze, en grattant chaque cent.

translation.en: Ain't nobody leave town until we collect it all.
translation.fr: Personne quittera la ville tant qu'on les aura pas.

translation.en: And if you fail to comply,
you and everything you love will burn.
translation.fr: vous serez réduits en cendres, avec tout ce qui vous est cher.

translation.en: I ain't got nothin' to rob.
But I got somebody to shoot. Step down.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai quelqu'un à abattre. Descendez.

translation.en: Fuck.
Redwood crawling with gunmen.
Rufus came with 12 and took six of mine.
translation.fr: Rufus en a ramené douze et m'en a piqué six.

translation.en: Who knows how many he got by now.
translation.fr: Qui sait combien se sont rajoutés ?

translation.en: I don't believe a thing this man sayin'.
translation.fr: Je crois pas un mot de ce qu'il dit.

translation.en: He a scout. I say we kill him.
translation.fr: C'est un éclaireur. Faut lui faire la peau.

translation.en: And we take the rest of them teeth.
You ever shot a sheriff, boy? A mayor?
translation.fr: T'as déjà descendu un shérif, mon garçon ? Un maire ?

translation.en: Little harder than shootin' regular folk. And I'm both.
translation.fr: C'est plus dur que les gens normaux. Et je suis les deux.

translation.en: [Bass] You both alive and dead 'cause Rufus don't like loose ends.
translation.fr: Tu es à la fois vivant et mort. Rufus n'aime pas le travail inachevé.

translation.en: Law don't find a man like Rufus Buck unless you got inside information.
translation.fr: La justice ne trouve pas un Rufus Buck sans un informateur.

translation.en: Ain't that right, Wiley?
If I had my way, you'd be right up under the jail next to Rufus.
translation.fr: Je t'aurais mis dans la cellule d'à côté.

translation.en: But you cut yourself a deal, wound up wearing a badge instead.
translation.fr: Mais tu as négocié et même obtenu un insigne.

translation.en: You got your reasons you want Rufus gone, and I got mine.
translation.fr: Vous avez vos griefs contre Rufus, et j'ai les miens.

translation.en: Ain't the enemy of my enemy my friend?
translation.fr: L'ennemi de mon ennemi est mon ami.

translation.en: Rufus tryin' to save Redwood. But for that, he need money.
translation.fr: Rufus veut sauver Redwood. Il lui faut de l'argent.

translation.en: And that's one thing he ain't have.
translation.fr: Et ça, il en a pas.

translation.en: All right, look here. You made a deal with the Devil.
translation.fr: Écoute-moi bien. Tu as fait un pacte avec le diable.

translation.en: Now he come to collect.
You rest up, but be gone before sunup.
Or it's gonna go from bad to badder. You hear?
translation.fr: Ou ça ira de mal en pire pour toi. Compris ?

translation.en: All them tricks'll get you killed, son.
translation.fr: À trop frimer, tu vas te faire tuer.

translation.en: [Jim] Listen, Marshal.
I'm faster than any weapon. You can trust in that.
translation.fr: Je tire plus vite que n'importe quelle arme, croyez-moi.

translation.en: I seen faster.
All right. Where?
In the mirror.
Negro said, "In the mirror."
[Jim] I'm so… I'm sorry.
I rather ride into a gun battle on a dark horse over a golden stallion.
translation.fr: Dans une fusillade, je mise sur l'outsider plutôt que sur le champion.

translation.en: -Fuck that mean? -Shiny shit get shot.
translation.fr: - Ça veut dire quoi ? - Ce qui brille se fait buter.

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
What you think about that, lawman?
translation.fr: Vous en dites quoi, l'homme de loi ?

translation.en: I think y'all gonna die.
[Nat singing] ♪ And away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
♪ As her garden grows ♪
♪ Hold those flowers close ♪
translation.fr: Il serre les fleurs contre lui

translation.en: ♪ For away with the wind ♪
translation.fr: Car où que le vent souffle

translation.en: ♪ She goes ♪
I'll be back with information by sunup.
Information from where?
Redwood.
You know we can't trust Wiley's word.
translation.fr: Tu sais qu'on peut pas se fier à Wiley.

translation.en: Someone's got to get the lay of the land before we make our next move.
translation.fr: Il faut repérer les lieux avant de passer à l'action.

translation.en: Yeah, Mary, but that somebody ain't got to be you.
Every gunhand in the territory's gonna recognize you the second you hop off your horse.
translation.fr: Les tireurs te reconnaîtront dès que tu sauteras de cheval.

translation.en: Same with Bill and Beckwourth.
In case you forgot,
translation.fr: Au cas où tu l'aurais oublié,

translation.en: your face more famous than all of ours put together, Stagecoach Mary.
translation.fr: ton visage est plus connu que tous les nôtres, Stagecoach Mary.

translation.en: Got it up on advertisements for that saloon of yours from here to Texas.
translation.fr: Il s'affiche sur les réclames pour ton saloon jusqu'au Texas.

translation.en: Which is why I can ride into town in plain sight.
translation.fr: Justement, je peux arriver à la vue de tous.

translation.en: Everybody knows I'm buying saloons.
translation.fr: J'achète des saloons. Rufus a besoin d'argent.

translation.en: Rufus need money. I'ma make him an offer on Trudy Smith's place--
translation.fr: J'achète des saloons. Rufus a besoin d'argent. Je négocierai celui de Trudy Smith…

translation.en: Mary, what in my character makes you think I'll allow that?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui te fait penser que je t'y autoriserai ?

translation.en: I'm not asking for your permission.
translation.fr: Je te demande pas la permission.

translation.en: All right.
Then I… I guess I'll just be asking you for yours.
translation.fr: J'ai plus qu'à te demander la tienne.

translation.en: Since you'll never let a man give you away,
translation.fr: Tu laisserais aucun homme donner ta main,

translation.en: I just have to ask you direct.
translation.fr: Tu laisserais aucun homme donner ta main, alors je te la demande à toi.

translation.en: That's the ring my father gave my mother.
translation.fr: Mon père a donné cette bague à ma mère.

translation.en: I was gonna give it to you back in Douglas.
translation.fr: Je voulais te l'offrir à Douglas.

translation.en: But you didn't.
I am now.
I used to hate feeling helpless over you.
translation.fr: Je me sentais désemparée, avec toi.

translation.en: Those days are over now.
Mary…
When the dust settles, we gonna go our separate ways, for good.
translation.fr: Quand tout sera terminé, on reprendra chacun sa route.

translation.en: But not till the dust settles. I'm here till then.
translation.fr: Mais pas avant. Pour le moment, je suis là.

translation.en: See you sunup.
Are you a resident of Redwood, ma'am?
You don't own a gun confident enough to ask where I reside.
translation.fr: C'est pas un de vos flingues qui me demandera où je réside.

translation.en: Well, this gun say answer the damn question.
translation.fr: Ce flingue vous dit de répondre à la question.

translation.en: Well, this gun don't talk.
[Trudy] Stagecoach Mary.
Ghastly Gertrude Smith.
I prefer Treacherous Trudy myself, but I'll take it.
translation.fr: Je préfère "Trudy la Traîtresse", mais d'accord.

translation.en: What brings you to my town?
I heard Rufus Buck was back.
translation.fr: Il paraît que Rufus Buck est revenu.

translation.en: -News travels fast. -[man chuckles]
I have an offer he might wanna hear about.
translation.fr: J'ai une offre qui pourrait l'intéresser.

translation.en: Well, any offer you got,
you can make it to me.
translation.fr: tu peux me la faire à moi.

translation.en: I don't do business with the help.
translation.fr: Je négocie pas avec la bonne.

translation.en: Give me that shit.
Lead the way, Treacherous Trudy.
translation.fr: Je te suis, Trudy la Traîtresse.

translation.en: Speak your piece.
translation.fr: Dis ce que tu as à dire.

translation.en: I assume you know who I am.
translation.fr: Vous devez savoir qui je suis.

translation.en: I assume you know who I used to run with.
translation.fr: Et de quelle bande j'ai fait partie.

translation.en: Those days are over for me anyhow,
translation.fr: Ce temps-là, c'est fini pour moi.

translation.en: but I didn't get to be Stagecoach Mary Fields
translation.fr: Mais je ne m'appellerais pas Stagecoach Mary

translation.en: without having my ears to the ground
translation.fr: si je ne tendais pas l'oreille,

translation.en: and my ears tell me you just lost 25 thou that was coming your way.
translation.fr: et mon oreille me dit que vous venez de perdre 25 000 $.

translation.en: [Trudy] I hope your proposal rivals your nerve--
translation.fr: Ton offre justifie un tel culot ?

translation.en: Allow me the latitude of completion.
My saloon in Douglas is boomin'.
Bought me another one in the Elks, and I got a restaurant in Cascade too.
translation.fr: J'en ai un autre dans les Elk et un restaurant à Cascade.

translation.en: For the sum of all that, I could take this one off your hands.
translation.fr: En échange de tout ça, je peux racheter celui-ci.

translation.en: The mere mention of my name brings forth good business
translation.fr: Mon nom est bon pour les affaires,

translation.en: to any establishment attached, whereas,
translation.fr: dans tout établissement qui le porte,

translation.en: with all due respect, but the name Rufus Buck instils fear.
translation.fr: alors que, sauf votre respect, celui de Rufus Buck inspire la peur.

translation.en: We know who you are.
You walkin' into my town with that proposal is risky.
translation.fr: Arriver chez moi avec cette proposition, c'est risqué pour toi.

translation.en: The kind of risk a woman such as yourself wouldn't tie herself to
translation.fr: C'est le genre de risque qu'une femme comme toi ne prendrait pas

translation.en: unless there was a whole lot more at stake.
translation.fr: s'il n'y avait pas autre chose en jeu.

translation.en: See, I don't believe in coincidence,
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas aux coïncidences,

translation.en: like you just gonna walk in here
translation.fr: comme ta venue ici juste après que les Crimson Hoods

translation.en: right after the Crimson Hoods get ambushed with my money.
translation.fr: comme ta venue ici juste après que les Crimson Hoods se sont fait plumer.

translation.en: What are you thinking?
You must have forgot whose name is on the door.
translation.fr: T'as dû oublier le nom sur le fronton.

translation.en: Another round.
We havin' a party, y'all. Come on.
translation.fr: C'est la fête, les amis. Allons !

translation.en: [Nat] All right, Mary.
All right.
So you still sayin' you don't know nothin' about that money and you done come here alone?
translation.fr: Tu persistes à dire que tu sais pas où est l'argent et que tu es seule ?

translation.en: That's right.
You done rode all the way over here to get yourself killed.
translation.fr: Tu as fait toute la route jusqu'ici pour te faire tuer.

translation.en: And for what?
For love?
Love is the only thing worth dying for.
translation.fr: Seul l'amour vaut la peine de mourir.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that.
translation.fr: Mais tu sais pas ce que c'est.

translation.en: You know,
I had a sister named Mary.
translation.fr: j'avais une sœur qui s'appelait Mary.

translation.en: She was pretty, strong-willed, like you.
translation.fr: Elle était jolie et forte tête, comme toi.

translation.en: She died of polio when I was 11.
translation.fr: Elle est morte de la polio.

translation.en: Always was in pain, but she'd never let me see her cry.
translation.fr: Elle souffrait constamment, mais elle me cachait ses larmes.

translation.en: There's this girl called Hope lived by us.
translation.fr: Il y avait une fille, Hope, qui vivait pas loin.

translation.en: Big fat kid, always picking on the smaller kids.
translation.fr: Une grosse gamine qui embêtait toujours les petits.

translation.en: Obviously out of jealousy.
But she ain't never fuck with me though.
translation.fr: Mais elle ne m'a jamais cherchée.

translation.en: She hated Mary with a passion,
always teasing her about how thin and frail she was.
translation.fr: elle se moquait sans arrêt de sa maigreur et de sa faiblesse.

translation.en: Then one day, Hope walkin' by our house,
translation.fr: Puis un jour, Hope est passée devant chez nous,

translation.en: apple in one hand, blade in the other.
translation.fr: une pomme dans une main et une lame dans l'autre.

translation.en: She decided to throw the apple across the street at Mary,
translation.fr: Elle a décidé de jeter la pomme sur Mary.

translation.en: and it hit my sister in the head and knocked her out of balance.
translation.fr: Ma sœur l'a prise en pleine tête et elle a perdu l'équilibre.

translation.en: She fell down the steps.
Broke her ankle.
And now that…
that was the first and only time I physically seen my sister cry.
translation.fr: c'est la première et la dernière fois que j'ai vu ma sœur pleurer.

translation.en: And there was Hope standing there laughin' her ugly fuckin' face off.
translation.fr: Hope est restée plantée là, à rire de toute sa sale tronche.

translation.en: My daddy…
he got home,
he took off his belt, and he beat me for not protecting my sister.
translation.fr: il a enlevé sa ceinture et il m'a battue pour ne pas avoir protégé ma sœur.

translation.en: He lashed me until my whole body went numb.
translation.fr: Il m'a fouettée jusqu'à ce que je ne sente plus rien.

translation.en: Then
he went to Hope house to do the same thing to her.
translation.fr: il est allé chez Hope pour lui en faire autant.

translation.en: When he got there, he saw her whole family standin' on the side of the house,
translation.fr: En arrivant, il a vu toute sa famille rassemblée devant la maison,

translation.en: all of 'em screamin' and cryin',
translation.fr: en train de hurler et de pleurer.

translation.en: and there was Hope…
lyin' on the floor in a pool of blood.
translation.fr: étendue dans une mare de sang.

translation.en: Somebody had slit her throat. Killed her with her own knife.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un lui avait tranché la gorge avec son propre couteau.

translation.en: Daddy was speechless.
He ain't said a word to me when he came home.
translation.fr: Il ne m'a pas dit un mot, en rentrant.

translation.en: The next day, he sent me to live with my grandparents.
translation.fr: Le lendemain, il m'a envoyée chez mes grands-parents.

translation.en: And then the next time I seen my sister,
translation.fr: Et je n'ai pas revu ma sœur

translation.en: she was laying in a coffin.
Disease had killed her.
I'm sorry your sister had to suffer.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée que ta sœur ait souffert.

translation.en: I admire her bravery.
But you get no words from me.
translation.fr: Mais je n'ai pas de mots pour toi.

translation.en: You know, I actually admire your bravery.
translation.fr: Moi, c'est ton courage que j'admire.

translation.en: But I'm afraid the outcome is still the outcome.
translation.fr: Mais ça ne change pas la conclusion.

translation.en: must die.
But not yet.
Leave her out here in the street so everybody can see her.
translation.fr: Laisse-la dans la rue, pour que tout le monde la voie.

translation.en: No one come to collect her 'fore sunup, put a bullet in her head.
translation.fr: Si personne vient la chercher avant l'aube, tu la butes.

translation.en: [man] Yes, ma'am.
Looks like we don't have to wait that long.
Whoever die first, right?
-Whoever die first. -[Jim] Mmm-hmm.
Get her up.
"Whoever die first"?
Now, what kind of dumbass saying is that?
translation.fr: C'est quoi, cette devise à la noix ?

translation.en: You two trying to get shot out here?
Nat Love. How predictable.
You predict my friend Bill Pickett aiming at your bowler cap?
translation.fr: Tu as prévu mon ami Bill Pickett qui cible ton chapeau melon ?

translation.en: You'll be dead before your boys get their aim.
translation.fr: Tu mourras avant que tes hommes visent.

translation.en: And you die right after.
But your boss won't see one red cent of that money.
translation.fr: Ton patron verrait pas la couleur de son argent.

translation.en: My boss?
Where is he?
Where is who?
[Nat] Marshal.
I'm speakin' English, yeah?
-Sound like English to me. -[Nat] Mmm-hmm.
Where's Rufus Buck?
[Bass] Trudy.
If I'd known you were switchin' sides, I'da asked you to come join us.
translation.fr: Si j'avais su que vous changeriez de camp, je vous aurais appelé.

translation.en: You here for your damsel in distress?
You don't look hard of hearing.
translation.fr: T'as pas l'air dure de la feuille.

translation.en: So I'ma ask you again.
Where's Rufus Buck?
Well, clearly, you don't know me.
translation.fr: Clairement, tu ne sais pas à qui tu as affaire.

translation.en: Tell your men to go,
but you stay,
and maybe your damsel will live a little longer.
translation.fr: Et ta dulcinée restera peut-être en vie.

translation.en: You're pretty though.
-Ah, take her ass back in there. -Yes, ma'am.
Gonna get me a drink.
That the quick draw I hear tell about, Cherokee Bill?
I hear you so fast that your opponents ain't got time to draw
translation.fr: Si rapide que ses adversaires dégainent même pas

translation.en: before you put two in they back.
translation.fr: avant qu'il leur tire dans le dos.

translation.en: No, that ain't me.
I'm the Cherokee Bill that shoots men in the mouth that talk too much.
translation.fr: Je suis le Cherokee Bill qui tire dans la gueule des frimeurs.

translation.en: I'll make it easy for you, then.
translation.fr: Je vais te faciliter la tâche.

translation.en: You draw first.
That what you think this is? "Who the quickest draw in the West?"
translation.fr: Tu veux jouer à la gâchette la plus rapide de l'Ouest ?

translation.en: All comes down to who fast and who ain't, right?
translation.fr: La victoire à qui tirera le premier.

translation.en: No, it all comes down to who's alive and who's dead.
translation.fr: Non, la victoire à qui restera vivant.

translation.en: Trudy, I'm gonna get me something to drink.
translation.fr: Trudy, je vais boire un verre.

translation.en: Good night.
Hey, hey, drink, my ass, man.
-I practiced that standoff all night. -Jim.
-[Jim] You're not about to walk away. -[Nat] Get out of here.
translation.fr: Me tourne pas le dos, un peu de respect…

translation.en: -No, nobody-- -[Nat] Get out of here, Jim.
-[Jim] That chicken-- -[Bass] It ain't the time.
[man] March, boy.
-I said march! -March.
translation.fr: - Marche, je te dis ! - Je marche.

translation.en: Hup, two, three, four.
That's enough.
They beat you bad?
I'ma kill 'em all.
[Rufus] You familiar with Napoleon?
translation.fr: Tu as entendu parler de Napoléon ?

translation.en: He said, "I am driven towards an end that I do not know."
translation.fr: Il a dit : "Une puissance supérieure me pousse à un but que j'ignore.

translation.en: "As I reach it, as I shall become unnecessary,
translation.fr: "Dès que je ne lui serai plus nécessaire,

translation.en: an atom shall suffice to shatter me."
"Until then, all forces of humankind can do nothing to stop me."
translation.fr: "Tant qu'il ne sera pas atteint, je serai invulnérable, inébranlable."

translation.en: That's a man who knew exactly who he was.
translation.fr: Il savait exactement qui il était.

translation.en: Most importantly,
he knew that his time would come to an end.
translation.fr: il savait que son heure viendrait.

translation.en: Cut him down.
You know why…
I gave you that scar?
[Nat] So I'd remember you.
[Rufus] No.
No, I gave you that scar so I can know your face when you come back to me.
translation.fr: Je te l'ai faite pour te reconnaître quand tu te présenterais à moi.

translation.en: the outlaw who robs outlaws,
translation.fr: le hors-la-loi qui dépouille les hors-la-loi,

translation.en: the angel of death who hunts down those who trespass against him with no mercy.
translation.fr: l'ange de la mort qui traque sans pitié ceux qui l'ont offensé.

translation.en: I know who you are.
And I see the line that you won't cross.
translation.fr: Je vois quelle ligne tu ne franchiras pas.

translation.en: See, I know what's on the other side.
translation.fr: Je sais ce qu'il y a de l'autre côté.

translation.en: Apologize for the beating.
It was more of an indication for what Ms. Fields might see
translation.fr: C'était pour montrer ce qui attend Mlle Fields

translation.en: if we fail to come to terms.
translation.fr: si on ne parvient pas à un accord.

translation.en: [Nat] What terms?
You will return the money you stole from me by Friday noon.
translation.fr: Tu vas me rendre l'argent volé d'ici vendredi midi,

translation.en: Not a moment later.
And you will add $10,000 on top of that. We'll call that interest.
translation.fr: Et tu ajouteras 10 000 $. Appelons ça les intérêts.

translation.en: Somethin' funny?
Ooh, shit, how… how you reckon I'ma get that?
translation.fr: Comment tu imagines que je vais les trouver ?

translation.en: You're gonna rob a bank.
Nat Love is gonna rob a bank.
translation.fr: Nat Love va dévaliser une banque.

translation.en: In the meantime, here's a little token of my appreciation in advance.
translation.fr: En attendant, voici par avance un gage de ma reconnaissance.

translation.en: Go ahead, open it.
I expect my money on Friday.
All of it.
[Bass] You know I can't let you do that.
translation.fr: Je peux pas te laisser faire ça.

translation.en: If that money ain't in Rufus' hands in three days, Mary'll die.
translation.fr: Si Rufus a pas le blé dans trois jours, il tuera Mary.

translation.en: [Pickett] What bank we talking about anyway? [Nat] Maysville.
translation.fr: - Tu vises quelle banque ? - Celle de Maysville.

translation.en: Maysville?
That's a white town.
Yeah, which is why they gonna have $10,000 in their bank.
translation.fr: Donc il y aura 10 000 $ à la banque.

translation.en: It's crazy.
[Jim] My emotions are all types of confused.
I mean, Pickett, I agree. That's crazy.
translation.fr: Pickett a raison, c'est de la folie.

translation.en: But, Nat, I also agree with you telling the marshal that we gonna do that shit anyways.
translation.fr: Mais Nat a aussi raison de dire qu'on va le faire quand même.

translation.en: That's some true outlaw shit.
-We outlaws, ain't we? -[Nat] Ain't no "we," Jim.
Not after that shit you pulled in town nearly got us all killed.
translation.fr: Pas après tes conneries d'hier. C'était limite.

translation.en: I had that.
[Nat] Fetch that money you took from the Crimson Hoods.
translation.fr: Va chercher le fric des Crimson Hoods.

translation.en: Pickett, kid, you comin' with me.
If Rufus Buck want that bank took, why don't he send his own men?
translation.fr: Pourquoi Rufus Buck fait pas le casse lui-même ?

translation.en: This way he clean, see?
I gotta go in barefaced as day,
translation.fr: Je dois y aller à visage découvert,

translation.en: a freshly minted bank robber, face up on wanted posters all over the territory.
translation.fr: un nouveau cambrioleur, recherché dans tout le territoire.

translation.en: They'll be on you like flies on shit before you open the door.
translation.fr: Ils fonceront sur toi avant que tu n'entres.

translation.en: Yep.
I said I had to be recognized.
translation.fr: Moi, il faut qu'on me reconnaisse.

translation.en: Go ahead.
[Cuffee] Hell no.
For Mary.
Close shave.
Close fucking shave!
I thought I was falling for a fella for a little bit.
translation.fr: J'ai cru que je craquais pour un gars.

translation.en: That's why I didn't say nothing.
Well, I ain't the only one. I can't…
translation.fr: Mais je suis pas le seul, ça se peut pas.

translation.en: I can't… It wasn't just me. It wasn't just me.
It was just you, Jim.
[Cuffee] Giddup now.
-[Nat] Allow me. -[grunts]
What's your real name?
Cuffee my real name.
Name I was born with? Cathay Williams.
translation.fr: Mon nom de baptême ? Cathay Williams.

translation.en: You walk worse than you ride, Cathay.
translation.fr: Tu es pire à pied qu'à cheval, Cathay.

translation.en: Mr. Love, my momma always told me to respect my elders,
translation.fr: Ma mère m'a appris à respecter mes aînés,

translation.en: so I'm not gonna say what I'm thinking.
translation.fr: je dirai pas ce que je pense.

translation.en: That's all right. I can read your mind.
translation.fr: Pas la peine, je lis dans tes pensées.

translation.en: Then I'm sorry you had to hear that.
Go ahead.
Go ahead, honey.
[teller] Yes?
I'd like to make a withdrawal.
What…
You have to have an account, ma'am.
translation.fr: Il faudrait avoir un compte, madame.

translation.en: And, well, I'd recommend a bank in Jericho or maybe Redwood for that.
translation.fr: Je vous conseille d'aller à la banque de Jericho ou de Redwood pour ça.

translation.en: I'm not talking about that kinda withdrawal.
translation.fr: Je parle pas de ce genre de retrait.

translation.en: I'm talk--
I'm talking about…
talking about that kind.
translation.fr: Je parle de ce genre de retrait.

translation.en: Hey, blue eyes.
You scared.
Your hand is shaking. You'll miss.
I won't.
Exhale.
Attaboy.
I ain't like my partner.
He don't wanna shoot nobody, but all of a sudden, I'm of a mind to.
translation.fr: Il veut blesser personne. Moi, j'ai comme une envie subite.

translation.en: Now open the fuckin' gate.
Think I'm funny now?
What you lookin' at?
Get all the customers over there.
-Get 'em over there! -Okay, okay.
-Everyone, please, this way quickly. -You too. Move!
translation.fr: - Par ici, s'il vous plaît. - Vous aussi !

translation.en: Times have changed, ain't they?
translation.fr: Les temps ont changé, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: They say robbing banks is hard work.
translation.fr: On dit que c'est dur, un cambriolage.

translation.en: That's a lie. Robbing banks is easy.
The hard part is doing it without killing.
translation.fr: Ce qui est dur, c'est de le faire sans tuer personne.

translation.en: So, what'll it be…
Mr. Manager?
Good man.
[Cuffee] Come on. Let's go.
Come on. Giddyap. Go.
-Pleasure banking with you. -Okay, sir.
translation.fr: - Ce fut un plaisir. - Oui, monsieur.

translation.en: Don't even look like much.
Ain't what it look like. It's what it can buy you.
translation.fr: L'important, c'est ce que ça nous achète.

translation.en: Rufus won't let Mary go once he gets that money.
translation.fr: Rufus relâchera pas Mary, même quand il aura l'oseille.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it.
He'll kill her, let me go, so's I carry that hurt with me.
translation.fr: Il va la tuer et me laisser libre pour que la douleur me hante.

translation.en: So what, we just went through all that trouble for nothin'?
translation.fr: Alors quoi, on a fait tout ça pour rien ?

translation.en: Now we got something he want.
And that's it?
Gonna have to be.
You can be all hasty and shoot me now if you want,
translation.fr: Vous pouvez me descendre sans réfléchir

translation.en: or you can wait to see what I brought with me first.
translation.fr: ou attendre de voir ce que je vous apporte.

translation.en: [Wiley] Rufus got stashes like this all across these hills.
translation.fr: Rufus a plein de caches d'armes dans ces collines.

translation.en: Enough for a small army.
Don't nobody take what I got coming to me.
translation.fr: Personne me prendra ce que je mérite.

translation.en: Not even the Devil himself.
translation.fr: Même pas le diable en personne.

translation.en: [Bass] Rufus Buck is a man.
Y'all best reconcile yourselves with that fact.
translation.fr: Vous devriez vous faire à cette idée.

translation.en: Man or devil, this gonna be Buck's last day amongst the living.
translation.fr: Homme ou démon, c'est son dernier jour parmi les vivants.

translation.en: ♪ Upon my return ♪
♪ See a changed soul ♪
-♪ That road was far ♪ -♪ That road was far ♪
-♪ And way too long ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ And way too long ♪
-♪ They'll run from me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ They'll run from me ♪
-♪ As they ran from you ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ As they ran from you ♪
translation.fr: Comme ils ont pu te fuir

translation.en: -♪ That fear in me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ That fear in me ♪
translation.fr: La peur que j'avais en moi

translation.en: ♪ Is in a distant view ♪
♪ Is ♪
♪ In a distant ♪
♪ View ♪
Afternoon.
I would ask you to run go fetch your superior,
translation.fr: Je te demanderais bien d'appeler ton supérieur,

translation.en: but that'd be like asking you to run go fetch your daddy.
translation.fr: mais ce serait comme te demander d'appeler ton père.

translation.en: It could be anybody, right?
You know,
I'm willing to bet my right arm
I've got a higher body count than yours.
translation.fr: que je traîne plus de cadavres.

translation.en: That'd be a bad bet, son.
I fancy that song or whatever it was you was whistling there.
translation.fr: J'aime bien cette chanson, celle que vous avez sifflée en arrivant.

translation.en: [Bass] Go, Jerry. Go.
That our money?
Walk with me.
Hey, just… just walk with me.
-Keep an eye on this, Angel. -[Angel] Mmm-hmm.
You know they call your boss the Devil hisself?
translation.fr: Tu sais qu'on traite ton patron de diable ?

translation.en: Even the Devil needed money, right?
translation.fr: Même le diable a besoin d'argent.

translation.en: So being as how we are in possession of that money…
translation.fr: Puisque c'est nous qui sommes en possession de cet argent,

translation.en: let me dictate the terms of engagement.
translation.fr: laisse-moi dicter les termes de l'accord.

translation.en: What the fuck was that? What the fuck was that, old man?
translation.fr: Putain, qu'est-ce que vous avez foutu, le vieux ?

translation.en: Is that the right arm or the left?
translation.fr: C'est le droit ou le gauche ?

translation.en: Oh man.
Well, now there's us…
and there's y'all.
You get a hold of your feisty buddy here.
You got a little rowdy rascal.
-Mary. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah, we'll get to that.
translation.fr: - Mary. - Oui, on va y venir.

translation.en: -We gonna count this first. -Now, Cherokee.
Or your boss gonna be one quick draw and $35,000 short.
translation.fr: Sinon ton patron va perdre un bon tireur et 35 000 $.

translation.en: All right.
Unhitch this horse so's Mary can ride out.
-You always move so slow? -[Cherokee Bill] You always talk so much?
translation.fr: - Toujours aussi lent ? - Toujours aussi causant ?

translation.en: [Nat] Really?
In the back?
What you think, Beckwourth?
Nah, he wouldn't do that
'cause then I would have to put a bullet in his cranium.
translation.fr: Parce que je devrais lui faire sauter le crâne.

translation.en: And we'll never know who the fastest really is now, will we?
translation.fr: Et on saurait jamais qui est le plus rapide.

translation.en: [Cherokee Bill] I gotta hand it to you, boy.
translation.fr: Je te tire mon chapeau, petit.

translation.en: You do know how to make a grand entrance.
translation.fr: Tu sais faire une entrée remarquée.

translation.en: Shit, I didn't even rehearse that one.
translation.fr: Et je l'ai même pas répétée.

translation.en: You know, quick draw, Nat Love is a dead man walking.
translation.fr: Tu sais, cow-boy, Nat Love est un homme mort.

translation.en: But you don't have to be.
Why don't you get on your horse, get your shit,
translation.fr: Remonte à cheval, prends ton barda

translation.en: and go back to whatever it is you call home?
translation.fr: et retourne là où tu te sens chez toi.

translation.en: You know that's impossible.
Count down from five?
Five…
Four…
Three…
Why do they always have to count so slow?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ils comptent toujours aussi lentement ?

translation.en: Jim!
Blow that bitch, Bill!
Kill her.
Push!
Trudy's mine.
Let's go.
[Cherokee Bill] Son of a bitch!
Exhale, motherfucker.
-Where'd they get you? -Shoulder. Get down!
translation.fr: - T'es touché ? - À l'épaule. À terre !

translation.en: Matches.
You wanna smoke now?
Matches, Bass.
Jump, motherfuckers.
Fuck it.
I always knew it was you
translation.fr: J'ai toujours su que c'était toi

translation.en: who gave me up.
God knew my heart.
Goodbye, old friend.
Rufus, I didn't have a choice--
I told that kid.
translation.fr: Je lui avais dit, à ce gamin,

translation.en: Them damn tricks…
-Sorry, ladies. -[footsteps rapidly approaching]
-You all right, Cuffee? -Just need to reload.
translation.fr: - Ça va, Cuffee ? - Je dois recharger.

translation.en: You look hurt, Mr. Pickett.
Ain't nothing but a flesh wound. Maggie ain't ready for me today.
translation.fr: C'est une égratignure. Maggie m'attend pas encore.

translation.en: What the fuck?
I'll be damned.
[Cuffee] Pickett!
[Cherokee Bill] Now, why you got that look on your face?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu me regardes comme ça ?

translation.en: No. No, no, no, brother, no, no, no.
Stop that. Don't do that.
You had a choice.
You always got a choice.
[speaking Cherokee] Being scared will only give you bad karma in the afterlife.
translation.fr: La peur ne t'apportera qu'un mauvais karma dans l'au-delà.

translation.en: He didn't even have a chance, you son of a bitch!
translation.fr: Il pouvait pas se défendre, fils de pute !

translation.en: You gonna shoot me in the back too? Or cheat the count?
translation.fr: Tu vas me tirer dans le dos aussi ? Ou tricher ?

translation.en: Beckwourth was faster.
Look after my friend.
[Bass] Nat.
Don't miss.
Pick up your guns.
[Rufus] I know what it is now.
It's the eyes.
Pick 'em up, I said.
[Rufus] Your father,
he was a good man?
He was.
And my mother was a good woman before you cut 'em down.
translation.fr: Et ma mère était une femme bien, avant que tu les fauches.

translation.en: Seems we had a different upbringing.
translation.fr: On n'a pas eu la même enfance.

translation.en: I don't care how you was raised.
translation.fr: Je me fiche de ton enfance.

translation.en: Now pick up your guns and turn around.
I used to watch my father beat my mother to a pulp
translation.fr: J'ai vu mon père tabasser ma mère

translation.en: if she overcooked his food.
translation.fr: pour avoir trop cuit le dîner.

translation.en: He cut her up real good if she undercooked it too.
translation.fr: Il la tailladait si c'était pas assez cuit.

translation.en: One day, I decided to intervene,
and he turned his wrath on me.
translation.fr: et il s'est défoulé sur moi.

translation.en: My father was not a good man.
translation.fr: Mon père n'était pas un homme bon.

translation.en: Not a good man. He was an outlaw.
Robbin' banks…
He liked to drink.
My mother took a bottle and cut him to protect me.
translation.fr: Ma mère l'a coupé avec un tesson de verre pour me protéger.

translation.en: He lashed back at her, and just like that, she was gone.
translation.fr: Il s'est jeté sur elle et cette fois, il l'a tuée.

translation.en: Then, like the coward he is,
translation.fr: Ensuite, en bon lâche qu'il était,

translation.en: he took everything we had and left,
translation.fr: il a pris tous nos biens et il est parti

translation.en: leaving me with my…
my mother.
I was ten years old, you know…
about the same age you was…
translation.fr: Plus ou moins l'âge que tu avais

translation.en: when I gave you that scar.
I had to fend for myself, but I became who I am,
translation.fr: J'ai dû me débrouiller seul et je suis devenu qui je suis,

translation.en: just like you.
As I did, all I could ever think about is wanting my father to pay for what he did.
translation.fr: Et pendant tout ce temps, je n'avais qu'une idée, faire payer mon père.

translation.en: I searched for him for years and years, and I could never find him.
translation.fr: Je l'ai recherché pendant des années, en vain.

translation.en: It's like he disappeared off the face of the earth.
I ain't stop though. I kept looking…
translation.fr: Mais je n'ai pas abandonné, j'ai continué à le chercher…

translation.en: until I did find him.
translation.fr: et j'ai fini par le trouver.

translation.en: One day…
lo and behold,
there he was, my father,
translation.fr: il était devant moi, mon père.

translation.en: a new man.
He was clean now.
Sober.
Man of God.
Had a church.
He had a pretty little wife.
translation.fr: Il avait une jolie petite femme

translation.en: And he had a son,
about the age of ten years old,
whose eyes blazed like mine.
translation.fr: au regard aussi ardent que le mien.

translation.en: You're lyin'.
You're lyin'!
Killing our father was retribution, but--
translation.fr: J'ai tué notre père en représailles…

translation.en: My father!
My mother!
But it weren't enough.
Letting you live,
that was the true revenge.
Every sin you made, every bank you robbed, everybody you killed.
translation.fr: Tous tes péchés, tous tes cambriolages, toutes tes victimes…

translation.en: I mean, look at you.
You everything he tried to run away from.
translation.fr: Tu es tout ce qu'il a essayé de fuir.

translation.en: Changed his name to "Love."
You a Buck.
Just like me.
Just like him.
But you better. You gonna surpass even me because…
translation.fr: Mais tu es meilleur. Même moi, tu vas me surpasser.

translation.en: I couldn't kill my brother.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas pu tuer mon frère.

translation.en: Yet here you are about to kill yours.
translation.fr: Mais toi, tu t'apprêtes à tuer le tien.

translation.en: [sighs] It's time to take your revenge, Nathaniel Buck.
translation.fr: Il est temps de te venger, Nathaniel Buck.

translation.en: Go on.
-Nathaniel Buck. -No.
Take your revenge.
-[gunshot] -Take your goddamn revenge!
You a Buck.
[Mary, softly] Is the Devil dead?
I don't know.
All right, fellas.
You sure the law gonna believe he's dead?
translation.fr: La justice va croire qu'il est mort ?

translation.en: I'm the law, Ms. Mary.
If I say a man dead, he dead.
translation.fr: Si je le dis, il est mort.

translation.en: And you?
You sure this what you want?
I always kinda wanted to be a deputy, sheriff, marshal person.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours voulu être adjoint du shérif ou du marshal, un truc dans le genre.

translation.en: What you lookin' at?
We got work to do, Mr. Love.
translation.fr: On a du travail, M. Love.

translation.en: Let's go.
All right.
♪ And upon my return ♪ ♪ You’ll see a changed soul ♪ ♪ The road was far too long ♪
translation.fr: "À LA MÉMOIRE DE MES CHERS FRÈRES, RICHARD ANTWI ET MICHAEL K. WILLIAMS"

translation.en: ♪ And there ain’t no turning around ♪
